featured.text: There were, however, no 23 crew members to perform impressive stunts at that time.

definition.zh_def: 一組在船、飛機或其他交通工具上工作的成員，負責操作和管理。
definition.en_def: A group of people working together on a ship, aircraft, or other vehicle, responsible for its operation and management.
definition.example: The crew worked tirelessly to ensure the flight was safe and on time.
